questions.question: What is the primary principle behind evaporative cooling?
choices: Absorption of heat during water evaporation
questions.answer: Absorption of heat during water evaporation

questions.question: Which climate type is most suitable for direct evaporative cooling?
What is the wet-bulb temperature?
choices: The highest temperature achievable through evaporative cooling
The lowest temperature achievable through evaporative cooling
The average temperature of water used in cooling
The temperature at which water boils in a given climate
questions.answer: The lowest temperature achievable through evaporative cooling

questions.question: What is the main difference between direct and indirect evaporative cooling?
choices: Direct cooling uses water, while indirect uses refrigerants
Direct cooling adds moisture to the air, while indirect does not
Direct cooling is more energy-efficient than indirect
Indirect cooling is only suitable for industrial applications
questions.answer: Direct cooling adds moisture to the air, while indirect does not

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common application of evaporative cooling?
What is a cooling tower primarily used for?
How does a roof spray system contribute to building cooling?
choices: By promoting evaporation on the roof surface
questions.answer: By promoting evaporation on the roof surface

questions.question: What is another common name for an evaporative cooler?
Which factor does NOT affect the rate of evaporation in cooling systems?
What is the wet-bulb depression?
choices: The temperature at which water condenses
The difference between dry-bulb and wet-bulb temperatures
questions.answer: The difference between dry-bulb and wet-bulb temperatures

questions.question: Which type of evaporative cooling system is more suitable for humid climates?
choices: Neither is suitable for humid climates

questions.question: What is a potential disadvantage of direct evaporative cooling in certain climates?
choices: It adds moisture to the air
It removes beneficial ions from the air
questions.answer: It adds moisture to the air

questions.question: How does indirect evaporative cooling maintain the original humidity level of the cooled air?
choices: By cooling air through a heat exchanger
questions.answer: By cooling air through a heat exchanger

questions.question: What percentage of electricity can evaporative coolers save compared to conventional air conditioning?
Which water management strategy can enhance the viability of evaporative cooling in water-scarce regions?
What is a potential issue with water quality in evaporative cooling systems?
How does the effectiveness of evaporative cooling change as air humidity increases?
Which type of climate in Timor Leste might benefit more from indirect evaporative cooling?
What is the primary environmental benefit of evaporative cooling compared to conventional air conditioning?
choices: Decreased energy use and greenhouse gas emissions
questions.answer: Decreased energy use and greenhouse gas emissions

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical component of a direct evaporative cooler?
What role does the secondary air stream play in an indirect evaporative cooling system?
choices: It is the air that is ultimately cooled and used
It undergoes evaporative cooling to cool the primary air stream
It provides additional moisture to the system
It removes excess heat from the compressor
questions.answer: It undergoes evaporative cooling to cool the primary air stream

questions.question: Which factor is most critical when considering the implementation of evaporative cooling in a region?
How can evaporative cooling systems be integrated with traditional Timorese building practices?
choices: By incorporating local materials in cooler designs
By using only imported cooling technologies
questions.answer: By incorporating local materials in cooler designs

questions.question: What is a potential challenge of implementing evaporative cooling in schools or healthcare facilities in Timor Leste?
Which of the following best describes the seasonal rainfall pattern in Timor Leste?
What is the average annual rainfall in Timor Leste?
Which water quality issue might be particularly relevant for coastal areas of Timor Leste when considering evaporative cooling?
What type of evaporative cooling system might be most appropriate for a small, rural school in a dry inland area of Timor Leste?
How might climate change affect the viability of evaporative cooling in Timor Leste over time?
choices: It may alter temperature and humidity patterns, affecting system efficiency
It will make evaporative cooling more effective everywhere
It will only affect coastal regions
questions.answer: It may alter temperature and humidity patterns, affecting system efficiency
